com.jcraft.jsch

Class HostKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcraft.jsch.HostKey

  • public class HostKey
extends Object
    The public key of a SSH server. This class encapsulates a list of host names and the public key of this host in one object.
    See Also:
    HostKeyRepository

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HostKey(String host, byte[] key)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HostKey

        public HostKey(String host,
               byte[] key)
        throws JSchException
        creates a host key by guessing it's type from the data.
        Parameters:
        host - the host name (or names, as a comma-separated list)
        key - the key data.
        Throws:
        JSchException

      • HostKey

        public HostKey(String host,
               int type,
               byte[] key)
        throws JSchException
        creates a host key with given type.
        Parameters:
        host - the host name (or names, as a comma-separated list)
        type - a constant for the type, one of SSHDSS or SSHRSA. (Some other types are used internally.)
        key - the key data.
        Throws:
        JSchException

      • HostKey

        public HostKey(String host,
               int type,
               byte[] key,
               String comment)
        throws JSchException
        Throws:
        JSchException
